meta.title: Iryna Panasiuk | Fullstack Developer Portfolio
meta.description: Portfolio of Iryna Panasiuk, a Fullstack Developer specializing in modern web technologies. Explore projects in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and more.

hero.title: Hello, I am Fullstack developer
hero.text: I am looking for opportunities for professional growth and am ready to join interesting projects where I can apply my skills.

about_me.story_text: I'm Ira, and my journey into the world of web development began with a simple curiosity: how are the websites we use every day created? This curiosity grew into a real passion. After completing intensive courses in full-stack development, I realized that this is exactly what I want to do. I am fascinated by the whole process: from the first idea to the finished product that users can see and feel.
about_me.inspiration_text: The opportunity to combine creativity with technology. Every project is a new challenge, a new opportunity to learn something interesting and create something useful. As a full-stack developer, I understand the importance of every detail - from page loading speed to intuitive interface. I strive to create not just websites, but digital experiences that are memorable.
about_me.open_to_projects: Always open to new projects and opportunities for professional growth!

my_projects.money_guard_desc: This is a comprehensive personal finance management application that empowers users with powerful tools for tracking income, monitoring expenses, and effective budget planning. The app combines an elegant, intuitive interface with advanced financial analytics and real-time transaction monitoring capabilities.
my_projects.phonebook_app_desc: This is a full-stack phonebook application that provides users with comprehensive contact management capabilities for maximum efficiency. The app features an elegant, intuitive interface for seamless contact operations: adding, editing, deleting, and quick searching with advanced filtering capabilities.
my_projects.learn_lingo_desc: This is an innovative web platform for a company specializing in online language learning with qualified instructors. The application creates seamless connections between students and experienced language experts, delivering personalized learning experiences across a wide range of languages and proficiency levels. The platform combines cutting-edge technology with individualized educational approaches.
my_projects.project_code_samurai_desc: This is an innovative personal finance management web application, expertly crafted by the CodeSamurai team. The platform combines elegant, intuitive design with powerful financial planning tools and comprehensive transaction monitoring, providing users with complete control over their finances.
my_projects.nodejs_mongodb_desc: This project is a Node.js application powered by MongoDB, developed as part of educational assignments for comprehensive backend development learning. The application demonstrates fundamental principles of building RESTful APIs using modern Node.js technologies, providing hands-on experience in server-side development.
my_projects.react_typescript_search_desc: This is a modern web application built with React and TypeScript, showcasing cutting-edge type-safe development practices. The project demonstrates seamless TypeScript integration with React to create robust, scalable applications with enhanced code maintainability. Through strict typing, it delivers an exceptional developer experience and outstanding runtime reliability.
my_projects.phonebook_auth_desc: This is a comprehensive React application that masterfully combines contact management with robust user authentication systems. The project represents the culmination of advanced React learning, showcasing cutting-edge development concepts: private routing, intelligent session management, and secure API integration. The application embodies best practices in modern frontend development.
my_projects.react_movies_desc: This is a modern cinematic app for searching and exploring movies, developed as part of the fifth homework assignment of the React course at GoIT. The app illustrates the practical application of key React concepts: routing via React Router, optimizing loading using code splitting, and effectively working with an external API to access a huge database of movies.
my_projects.fullstack_portfolio_desc: This is an elegant professional portfolio website for fullstack developer Lloyd Jefferson, expertly crafted by the SurvivorsTeam13 team as an educational project. The platform showcases technical skills, extensive experience, and outstanding projects through a modern, visually appealing design that reflects high levels of professionalism and creativity.
my_projects.image_search_desc: This is an interactive web image search application developed as part of Homework #12 for the JavaScript course at GoIT. The application allows users to efficiently search for images by keywords and easily download additional results using the «Load More» feature.
my_projects.simply_chocolate_desc: This is an exquisite premium chocolate company website that elegantly showcases artisanal chocolate delicacies, unique manufacturing processes, and unforgettable customer experiences. This fully responsive site embodies cutting-edge web development techniques with emphasis on flawless user experience and captivating visual aesthetics that reflect the luxurious nature of the brand.
my_projects.mobileapp_prototype_desc: This is a sophisticated mobile application prototype that embodies best practices in contemporary mobile development and user experience design. The project represents a meticulously crafted landing page featuring interactive app capability demonstrations, talented team presentation, and genuine user reviews, forming a cohesive vision of an innovative mobile product.
my_projects.yachtjet_desc: This is an elite premium platform for luxury yacht rentals, offering an exclusive collection of high-end vessels for sophisticated maritime adventures and unforgettable getaways. The project features a refined booking system with detailed yacht specifications, professional photo galleries, and authentic testimonials from discerning clients, creating a flawless luxury experience.
my_projects.webstudio_desc: This is a modern, fully responsive business portfolio website that showcases innovative and effective solutions for the corporate sector. The project embodies high-level web development expertise with emphasis on minimalist design, seamless user experience, and cutting-edge web technologies, creating a compelling digital presence for business audiences.

work_together.article: Contact me to transform your ideas into exceptional solutions.
work_together.modal_title: Thank you for your interest in cooperation!
work_together.modal_text: The manager will contact you shortly to discuss further details and opportunities for cooperation. Please stay in touch.
